title: Focus and directrix
---

\\(
\newcommand{\A}[1]{\colorbox{CornflowerBlue}{$\displaystyle #1$}}
\newcommand{\B}[1]{\colorbox{lightgray}{$\displaystyle #1$}}
\newcommand{\C}[1]{\colorbox{BurntOrange}{$\displaystyle #1$}}
\\)

$$
ax^2+bx+c
$$

$$
D=b^2-4ac
$$

$$
h=-\frac{b}{2a}
$$

$$
k=-\frac{D}{4a}
$$

Focus

$$
F=(x_0,y_0)
$$

Directrix
$$
y=d
$$

$$
d=k-p
$$
